nodes.text: An ancient artifact held a religious significance to the Khil, a sentient species native to the planet Belnar.

Around 3643 BBY, a Republic senator from Belnar went missing along with the artifact. An individual sent a companion to Belnar to find the lost senator. Upon doing so, the companion tricked the senator into confessing that he had the artifact in his possession, and the item was subsequently returned to the grateful Khil.
